content: the teardrop hanging basket is a quick easy and whimsical container that will serve as a lovely home décor project it has a loop that can be hung up on a knob or a hook inside the basket you can place your cute amigurumi dolls a potted succulent plant or other trinkets the basket is worked seamlessly in one piece requiring no sewing this pattern includes the original basket size a small version and a large version so you can make a nice collection of varying sizes these baskets make great housewarming gifts ~~~ **size ** small original medium and large sizes are available small height 9 23 cm width 6 15 25cm original height 10 5 26 5 cm width 6 5 16 5cm large height 12 30 5 cm width 7 5 19cm **level ** ★★☆☆☆ easy / familiar beginner requires familiarity with the stitches used below **stitches/terms us terms ** magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch increase a k a 2 single_crochet in same st increase decrease a k a 1 single_crochet in 2 sts decrease **materials ** super bulky weight 6 yarn i used chiffon ribbon ombre pack from darn good yarn 50 yd for small 70 yd for original 80 yd for large 9 mm crochet hook large-eyed yarn needle scissors ~~~ this pattern is © 2019 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website no wholesale * www sweetsofties com www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties www pinterest com/sweetsofties
